item.title: Home
item.description: Summary: Crab is a clean Hugo theme for websites. Its features include responsiveness, nested menu support, two-column layout, tag and blog article support. Welcome to Crab! Crab is a clean Hugo theme for websites. Some of its features: Responsive design – view it on mobile Nested menus – try the menu above Two-column layout Tags Blog articles A very popular quote: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
